txt.en: The fortress of Skarháld is under attack! The Frost-horde has launched an assault from parts unknown in Ered Mithrin in hopes to drive the dwarves away….\n\nYour mission is to defend the fortress of Skarháld from a Frost-horde assault.
You have been tasked with defending the fortress of Skarháld from a Frost-horde assault.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts have reported a band of drakes, flying towards Skarháld! I am certain the frost drakes will assault our fortress in Ered Mithrim! We must depart for Skarháld immediately and assist in thwarting this assault!'
Complete Mission: An Assault of Frost
The monster commander in this mission will attempt to summon blizzards.
Your mission is to defend the fortress of Skarháld from a Frost-horde assault.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Skarháld.
'Well done! With the drake assault defeated, Skarháld is once again safe! The last thing we need is our greatest fortress of Ered Mithin in ruin!'
